title: Flaunt Your Connections
description: The player calls upon a supposed connection within the Spiral Gang to add pressure on Royce and Dum Dum to lower their price, displaying confidence.
dialogue: You stand confidently, a smirk on your face. 'You know, I have a friend in the Spiral Gang who would love to hear how you treat your customers,' you say, your tone dripping with bravado. Royce's expression shifts to one of concern as Dum Dum's posture tenses. 'What are you trying to pull here?' Royce asks, defensive.

npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Glares at you, weighing his options.

player_options: Insist on involving your 'friend' and threaten to report them.
Offer to set up a meeting with your 'friend' as leverage.
Back off the threat but continue to pressure them.

title: Offer a Trade
description: The player proposes a trade to the NPCs instead of monetary payment, offering something in exchange for the robot.
dialogue: You take a step closer, a thoughtful look on your face. 'What if I could offer you something else instead of cash? I’ve got a stash of supplies that could interest you,' you suggest, noticing Royce's interest spike. 'Supplies?' Dum Dum echoes, curiosity piquing. 'What do you have?'

npc_reactions.Royce: Nods, intrigued by the potential trade.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Raises an eyebrow, assessing the value of your offer.

player_options: List the specific supplies you have to trade.
Ask what kind of supplies they need.
Extend the negotiation by suggesting a bigger deal.

title: Play the Fool
description: The player pretends to be gullible, acting as if they don’t understand how negotiations work, which confuses the NPCs.
dialogue: You tilt your head, feigning confusion. 'I don’t get it... why would I pay extra when everyone knows robots should be cheap?' you state with a naïve tone. Royce looks at you in hesitant disbelief, while Dum Dum's smirk drops momentarily. 'What are you trying to pull?' Dum Dum asks, annoyance creeping in as they try to gauge your sincerity.

npc_reactions.Royce: Frowns, clearly unhappy with your approach.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Contemplates whether to laugh or get annoyed.

player_options: Continue to act oblivious and play the fool.
Suddenly show cleverness, revealing you were testing them.
Ask for a complete breakdown of costs they're working with.
